CustomField.description: QR Code for the inventory item.
CustomField.formula: IMAGE("https://api.qrserver.com/v1/create-qr-code/?data=" + Id, "QR Code For " + RentalProduct__r.Name + " at " + Location__r.Name, 200, 200)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: QR Code for the inventory item.
CustomField.label: Inventory QR Code
